h2_title: Where to Find The Monk from the Sea
h3_title: Monk from the Sea Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: By now you're well aware of this Monk's ability to use their tentacles to strike at you form a distance, both in a three-hit combos to stab outward, or in spinning horizontal sweeps. By recognizing the timing, you can make good use of deflecting these attacks or immobilizing him mid swing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Monk_from_the_Sea.md', within the main section titled 'Monk from the Sea', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find The Monk from the Sea' and the sub-subsection 'Monk from the Sea Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
By now you're well aware of this Monk's ability to use their tentacles to strike at you form a distance, both in a three-hit combos to stab outward, or in spinning horizontal sweeps. By recognizing the timing, you can make good use of deflecting these attacks or immobilizing him mid swing.
